BIO

Developer & Designer

I am a Front-End Web Developer from Lagos, Nigeria. I have a serious passion for graphic designs, web animations and creating dynamic user experiences regardless any device.

Since the start of my journey as a Developer, i've created sucessful responsive websites that are fast, easy to use and built with good practices. The main area of my expertise is front-end development, HTML, CSS, J.S, building small web apps, features and animations.

Well-organised person, problem solver, freelancer with high attention to detail. Fan of one-piece anime, outdoor activities like swimming, and my eastern novels. A christain.

Interested in the entire front-end spectrum and working with all kind of persons.

My Front-End Skillset

My Services

Web Development

Consequently, technology and web design keeps advancing and we are constantly tweaking our techniques in tandem with the ever-changing digital landscape.

Graphic Designs

Social Media PR
